item.description:
Techniques for Rational Discussion of Atheism with Theists
How do you handle explaining your atheism to believers (which is just about everyone)? In this first Sunday morning topical meeting, attendees are invited to share their techniques, experiences, and advice for keeping it calm and cool when explaining your beliefs to others.

We will also discuss the frequency of this meeting in the future, pick a tentative date for the next one, and take suggestions for topics.

A reporter attended our last Wednesday evening meeting, and we expect a photographer, Joanne Ciccarello, to attend this Sunday meeting to obtain illustrations to accompany the story in the Christian Science Monitor (a non-denominational and international newspaper on current events, online daily and in print weekly). In your reply, please let us know if you are willing to have your "graven image" and/or name included with the story. And if you attend the meeting, please let the photographer know if you prefer not to have your picture or name published.
